data.text: @drwgsi @NYPostOpinion Happily wear a mask, or do so because they have been sufficiently frightened into complete submission despite being a relatively low risk population. Old faculty are afraid, which is why they demand rules that serve to protect only themselves.

@NYPostOpinion Ban all imports, exports, contact, dealings with China, Iran, Russia! Seize all their assets, all businesses and companies! Fine every company, business, industry that does, has any dealings with them! Arrest and jail every government official, including elected with contact!
@NYPostOpinion As a person that teaches at a college, most college students agree with the restrictions and happliy wear masks.
